title: ASU Bookstore  · Angelo State University
description: Shop for textbooks, gifts, apparel and more at Ram Central Station, the ASU Bookstore, conveniently located on Angelo State’s campus or online.

paragraphs: You can visit the Ram Central Station oncampusor online.

Angelo State University contracts with Follett Higher Education Group to provide management of Ram Central Station (the ASU Bookstore), which is located on the first floor of theHouston Harte University Centerat 1910 Rosemont Drive.

Through our contracted provider, Ram Central Station aims to provide a full range of course materials and retail (gifts, apparel and merchandise) products and services through the operation of a full service bookstore to meet all needs on campus. Our mission is to provide customer-friendly services that support campus operations and the academic mission of the university while making each experience a positive and successful one that advances the ASU student academic and co-curricular experience.

Angelo State University encourages students to purchase or rent textbooks from Ram Central Station at the campus location or online atshopangelo.com. Ram Central Station offers textbooks for classes, as well as school supplies, gift and spirit items, mugs, hats, backpacks and clothing. Great services and a variety of selections are available, and a portion of every sale supports campus services and student activities.

In accordance withTexas Education Code 51.9705, the University informs that, “A student of this institution is not under any obligation to purchase a textbook from a university-affiliated bookstore. The same textbook may also be available from an independent retailer, including an online retailer.”

Ram Central Station (the ASU Bookstore) has a price matching program. If students find their purchased course materials advertised at a lower price from a competing retailer, they are eligible to receive the difference in price from Ram Central Station (the ASU Bookstore). This ensures students get their materials at the best price possible and allows them to apply price-match funds to other supplies or needed materials. See store for more details.
After finding your textbook(s) using the procedures above:
The order confirmation number will display when you place the order.

Your ordered items may be acquired from multiple locations across nationwide inventory channels.Please order at least 5-7 business days before the start of classesto allow for delivery time. Even if you are picking up your order in the store, another location may be shipping us your item(s) if we did not have the book(s) in the new or used condition you ordered.
